LanguageData.Hediffs_MetabolismLv1.label: Recovery Power Lv.1
LanguageData.Hediffs_MetabolismLv1.description: Kaifuku (Recovery) Power Tip 1: Earn experience points for this skill by continuing to eat foods with the same type of buff.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MetabolismLv2.label: Recovery Power Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_MetabolismLv2.description: Kaifuku (Recovery) Power Tip 2: This buff can go up to Level 4.
LanguageData.Hediffs_Metabolism.label: Recovery Power
LanguageData.Hediffs_Metabolism.description: Kaifuku (Recovery) Power: I eat with gratitude for all the ingredients in the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
